Title: #162 Minecraft in the classroom
Description:
Jeff Geargardt, uses Minecraft EDU to teach students lessons as he works with cross-disciplinary teaching. He’ll share a science lesson how he had students “living on Mars” in Minecraft. He’ll share some of his tips and tricks and how to get started.

www.coolcatteacher.com/e162
